title: Merge DNA files
subtitle: Upload 1-10 DNA files to convert or merge with priority-based conflict resolution

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer:
disclaimer.message: This tool is for genealogical research and personal informational purposes only. It is not intended for medical, diagnostic, or scientific use. Results are provided as-is without guarantees of accuracy or completeness. For medical or health-related decisions, please consult qualified healthcare professionals and certified genetic counselors.

privacy.title: Your Privacy is Protected:
privacy.message: All DNA file processing happens entirely in your browser on your computer. No data is uploaded to any server. Your genetic information never leaves your device.

options.tooltip_conflict_resolution: When merging 3+ files, choose how to resolve conflicts where files disagree on the same SNP. 'Win by Consensus' selects the genotype that appears most frequently across all files, with ties broken by file priority.
options.tooltip_fill: When enabled, fills missing values (-- or 00) by scanning files in priority order and using the first non-missing value found. When disabled, always uses the value from the first file (highest priority).
options.tooltip_multibase: When enabled, splits long Indel genotypes like 'TAAGTGTAAGTG' into 'TAAGTG TAAGTG'. When disabled (default), these variants are skipped. Primarily affects LivingDNA files.
options.tooltip_invalid_positions: Include rows with chromosome='0' or position='0' when they have standard rsIDs (like 'rs123') or non-empty alleles. Rows with custom names AND empty alleles (--) are always skipped.
